Package com.library.backend.services.operator

Class OperatorBooksService

java.lang.Object
com.library.backend.services.operator.OperatorBooksService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
public class OperatorBooksService extends Object implements Service
The OperatorBooksService class provides services for managing book-related operations and book inventory for operators in the library system.

      Constructs an OperatorBooksService instance with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      bookFormRepository - The repository for managing book forms.
      bookInventoryRepository - The repository for managing book inventories.
      eventNotificationRepository - The repository for managing event notifications.
      bookRepository - The repository for managing books.

    • getAllBookInventories

      public List<BookInventory> getAllBookInventories()
      Retrieves a list of all book inventories in the library.
      Returns:
      A list of book inventories.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs while retrieving book inventories.

    • searchBookInventory

      public Collection<BookInventory> searchBookInventory(String stringToSearch) throws SearchEngineException
      Searches for book inventories based on the specified search string.
      Parameters:
      stringToSearch - The search string for book inventories.
      Returns:
      A collection of matching book inventories.
      Throws:
      SearchEngineException - If an error occurs during the search operation.
